newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Second S.Korean soldier dead in clash with agents.
newsitem.headline: Second S.Korean soldier dead in clash with agents.

text.p: A second South Korean soldier died of his wounds after a shootout with North Korean infiltrators on Sunday in which two communist agents were also killed, a defence ministry spokesman said.
The gunbattle broke out at dawn as Southern security forces pursued the remnants of a group of around 26 agents who landed by submarine on a beach near the east cost city of Kangnung on Wednesday.
South Korean forces have now killed nine of the agents and captured one alive, while the bodies of 11 others were found, possibly shot by their colleagues.
Three South Korean troops have been reported killed during a deadly game of cat-and-mouse.
A Southern paratrooper was shot and killed on Saturday. According to some media reports he was shot while dangling on a winch line from a helicopter that was lowering him to the ground.
